content:
Currently DiagnostiReport has a DSTU note in the Boundaries section
referring to the boundary between it and Composition....

"DSTU Note: The relationship between the two resources is subject to ongoing evaluation during the trial use period.
Feedback is welcome here ."

Well ... I have have had zero feeback since DSTU2 ballot. Is anybody using composition in lieu of DiagnosticReport? and what for and why?

I have posted a #12249 to remove the note and the preceding paragraph since it describes Composition in a rather generic way that could apply to almost any clinical resource.
